summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2576, for the improvement of 8th Avenue West, from West Wheeler Street to West Fulton Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with the necessary wooden cross walks and wood or concrete stairways, providing for the necessary surface drainage,, under Ordinance No. 30026 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
